elements.name: US01_TC01 User must be able to login to the Site with a valid URL

steps.name: User goes to url.
The user verifies that at "https://www.amazon.com/".
The user closes the page.

elements.name: US02_TC01 The user should be able to login with valid information. (Positive Login)

steps.name: User goes to url.
The user clicks the Sign-In button..
User enters valid email.
The user clicks the continue button.
User enters valid password.
The user clicks the Sign-In button.
The user sees the text "Hello,USER".
User logs out of account
The user closes the page.

elements.name: US02_TC02 The user should not be able to login with invalid information. (Negative Login)

steps.name: User goes to url.
The user clicks the Sign-In button..
User enters valid email.
The user clicks the continue button.
User enters invalid password.
The user clicks the Sign-In button.

steps.name: kullanici "Electronics" Basligina Tiklar
The user should be able to see and click all the titles in the ALL menu.

elements.name: US04_TC01 When the user searches for a product, all listed products must contain the searched word

steps.name: User goes to url.
User types the "mango" in the search box.
User verifies that the "mango" he is looking for includes the products listed.
The user closes the page.

elements.name: US04_TC01 When the user searches for a product, all listed products must contain the searched word

steps.name: User goes to url.
User types the "nutella" in the search box.
User verifies that the "nutella" he is looking for includes the products listed.
The user closes the page.

elements.name: US04_TC01 When the user searches for a product, all listed products must contain the searched word

steps.name: User goes to url.
User types the "suite case" in the search box.
User verifies that the "suite case" he is looking for includes the products listed.
The user closes the page.

elements.name: US05_TC01 User should be able to use filters and sorting in product listing process

steps.name: User goes to url.
User types the "macbook" in the search box.
The user selects the appropriate filter to list the products he has listed.

elements.name: US05_TC01 User should be able to use filters and sorting in product listing process

steps.name: User goes to url.
User types the "gaming mouse" in the search box.
The user selects the appropriate filter to list the products he has listed.

steps.name: The user searches and lists the "macbook" he wants to buy in the search box
The user chooses the products he wants to buy.
User goes to cart.
The user confirms that the selected products have been added to the cart.
The user confirms that the total price of the selected products is the same as the total price in the basket.

elements.name: US06_TC01 User should be able to choose random products and add to cart. You should see that the total price of the added products and the total in the basket are the same.

steps.name: User goes to url.
The user searches and lists the "gaming mouse" he wants to buy in the search box
The user chooses the products he wants to buy.
User goes to cart.
The user confirms that the selected products have been added to the cart.
The user confirms that the total price of the selected products is the same as the total price in the basket.

elements.name: US07_TC01 The user should make sure that the links in any row or column of the links at the bottom of the home page lead to the correct page.

steps.name: User goes to url.
User goes to FOOTER.
The user clicks on a link.
The user verifies the title of the page he is directed to.
The user closes the page.
User goes to url.
The user clicks the Sign-In button..
User enters valid email.
The user clicks the continue button.
User enters valid password.
The user clicks the Sign-In button.
User hover-over Account &Lists.
The user clicks on the Create a List link.
User clicks Create a List button.
User enters List Name.
User clicks end of Create a List button.

elements.name: US_08 User should be able to create and delete shoppingList.

steps.name: User verifies that the list is created.
User goes to Manage list.
User clicks on Delete list button
The user confirms that the list has been deleted.
The user closes the page.
User goes to url.
The user clicks the Sign-In button..
User enters valid email.
The user clicks the continue button.
User enters valid password.
The user clicks the Sign-In button.
User hover-over Account &Lists.
The user clicks on the Create a List link.
User clicks Create a List button.
User enters List Name.
User clicks end of Create a List button.

elements.name: US_09 User should be able to create and delete shoppingList.

steps.name: User types the "iphone 13 512" in the search box.
The user goes to the product page.
User clicks Add to List button.
The user confirms that the selected product has been added to the list.
The user clicks the View Your List button and sees the List.
The user clicks the Delete button and sees the Deleted alert.
The user closes the page.
